items.sentence: Tom was permitted to tell Mary everything he knew.
Tom was able to do everything he promised he'd do.
Tom isn't Mary's stepfather. He's her real father.
Tom was the only one at the party who fell asleep.
Tom didn't know whether Mary wanted to stay or go.
Tom was the one who told me that I should do that.
Tom isn't a science teacher. He's a music teacher.
We're lucky that we were able to avoid doing that.
There is a high probability that we won't survive.
Tom was the one who told me that I had to do that.
